TopicTitle: How long does it take for KSP to load for you?

Articles.Content:
How long does it take for KSP to load for you?

And if the loading time is quick for you, do you use mods?

Edited June 13, 2021 by theleg
Around 1 minute with >16K MM patches in cashe on spinning rust plumbed up to 32GB of DDR4 and unlocked framerates. Which is about ~30 mods.

23 minutes ago, Incarnation of Chaos said:

Around 1 minute with >16K MM patches in cashe on spinning rust plumbed up to 32GB of DDR4 and unlocked framerates. Which is about ~30 mods.

Wow, that's quick!

Just now, theleg said:

Wow, that's quick!

There's a lot to be said for brute force

If i had a Ryzen 3000 or 5000 series chip, that would probably send it well below a minute tbh.
SDD makes it faster than HDD.

Depends very heavily on what I’m playing- just spinning up base KSP on my SSD takes about a minute, but booting up my RP-1 save on the same SSD takes about 10-15 minutes depending on various factors like “is it an odd-numbered day of an even-numbered month that begins with a T or an S”…
Depends on the setup of course, but I clocked a full 1.9.1 install with around 100 mods at 8 minutes from a 7200 rpm mechanical drive.

01:11 to main menu, another 20s to main save loaded.

And that includes taking a timestamped backup of my saves.
~1 minute for my main game, which is stock with scatter. I have another copy which is lightly modded (4 or 5 mods) that takes probably 2 minutes to load.
